title: Heartseeker Orianna SFX
body:
I recently got this skin, but it feels like I'm missing some sound effects on her abilities -- most notably, her E.

Not sure if it's because it's just hard to notice or...?

Can someone please confirm?

replies.body: Taliyah's sound files are also a bit odd, I've noticed sometimes when I'm comboing the noise from her Q will stop, or continue on after I only shoot one rock because of worked ground. I also hear the noise for the start of her E randomly sometimes while using W and Q.
